summary:
Digimon is a cool Japanese franchise that started as virtual pet toys and grew into a huge hit! It includes anime, manga, video games, and even trading cards. These digital monsters live in a world called the "Digital World," which is like a virtual universe connected to Earth's networks.

Originally designed to be cute, the Digimon characters later got a cooler makeover inspired by American comics. The first video game, "Digimon World," was a big success, leading to popular anime shows and various fun games. By the year 2000, Digimon had made over $500 million in sales!
title: Digimon
